ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:49:42 [Issue ID 4000-809824] urn:comicvine:4000-809824 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:49:19. [Issue ID 2154763]
ComicInfo.Summary: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis - Part IV - Shot in the Dark: In the Dark Multiverse, on the perpetual crisis worlds of Crisis on Infinite Earths, Infinite Crisis, and Final Crisis, Wonder Woman faces Superboy-Prime, Superman faces Darkseid, and Batman faces the Anti-Monitor, and they must win out against their enemies to capture the Crisis Energy to defeat Perpetua and the Darkest Knight and restore the Multiverse.
ComicInfo.Title: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis - Part IV - Shot in the Dark
